Package com.github.jsonj

Classes that represent json in Java.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JsonElement Super type of all Json elements (object, list, and primitive).
 

Class Summary
JsonArray Representation of json arrays that extends LinkedList.
JsonObject Representation of json objects.
JsonPrimitive Representation of json primitives.
 

Enum Summary
JsonType All the types that json has.
 

Package com.github.jsonj Description

Classes that represent json in Java. There are three classes: JsonObject, JsonArray, and JsonPrimitive. They each implement the JsonElement interface. Additionally, JsonObject and JsonArray extend the Java collections framework. Consequently, you can use them as a Map<String, JsonElement> and List<JsonElement> respectively.
